00001 #include "submissioninfo.h"
00002 #include "utils/stringoperations.h"

00004 #include <sstream>
00005 #include <stdexcept>

00008 using namespace std;
00009 
00010 std::string sourceToString(SubmissionInfo::TrackSource source, const std::string& recommendationKey)
00011 {
00012     switch (source)
00013     {
00014         case SubmissionInfo::UserChosen:
00015             return "P";
00016             break;
00017         case SubmissionInfo::NonPersonalizedBroadCast:
00018             return "R";
00019             break;
00020         case SubmissionInfo::PersonalizedRecommendation:
00021             return "E";
00022             break;
00023         case SubmissionInfo::Lastfm:
00024             return "L" + recommendationKey;
00025             break;
00026         case SubmissionInfo::Unknown:
00027         default:
00028             return "U";
00029     }
00030 }
00031 
00032 std::string ratingToString(SubmissionInfo::TrackRating rating)
00033 {
00034     switch (rating)
00035     {
00036         case SubmissionInfo::Love:
00037             return "L";
00038             break;
00039         case SubmissionInfo::Ban:
00040             return "B";
00041             break;
00042         case SubmissionInfo::Skip:
00043             return "S";
00044             break;
00045         case SubmissionInfo::None:
00046         default:
00047             return "";
00048     }
00049 }

00051 SubmissionInfo::SubmissionInfo()
00052 : NowPlayingInfo()
00053 , m_TimeStarted(0)
00054 , m_Source(UserChosen)
00055 , m_Rating(None)
00056 {
00057 }

00068 : NowPlayingInfo(artist, track)
00069 , m_TimeStarted(timeStarted)
00070 , m_Source(UserChosen)
00071 , m_Rating(None)
00072 {
00073 }
00074 
00075 string SubmissionInfo::getPostData(int index) const
00076 {
00077     if (m_Source == UserChosen && m_TrackLengthInSecs < 0)
00078     {
00079         throw logic_error("Tracklength is required when submitting user chosen track");
00080     }
00081 
00082     stringstream ss;
00083     ss  << "&a[" << index << "]=" << StringOperations::urlEncode(m_Artist)
00084         << "&t[" << index << "]=" << StringOperations::urlEncode(m_Track)
00085         << "&i[" << index << "]=" << m_TimeStarted
00086         << "&o[" << index << "]=" << sourceToString(m_Source, m_RecommendationKey)
00087         << "&r[" << index << "]=" << ratingToString(m_Rating)
00088         << "&l[" << index << "]=" << (m_TrackLengthInSecs > 0 ? StringOperations::getPostData(m_TrackLengthInSecs) : "")
00089         << "&b[" << index << "]=" << StringOperations::urlEncode(m_Album)
00090         << "&n[" << index << "]=" << (m_TrackNr > 0 ? StringOperations::getPostData(m_TrackNr) : "")
00091         << "&m[" << index << "]=" << StringOperations::urlEncode(m_MusicBrainzId);
00092 
00093     return ss.str();
00094 }
00095 
00096 time_t SubmissionInfo::getTimeStarted() const
00097 {
00098     return m_TimeStarted;
00099 }

00103     m_Source = source;
00104     m_RecommendationKey = recommendationKey;

00108 {
